test-case.name: fn-innermost-055
test-case.description: Evaluates the "innermost" function with the input sequence not in document order
test-case.test: let $in := for $x in //* order by local-name($x) return $x return deep-equal(fn:innermost($in)/local-name(), fn:innermost(//*)/local-name())

test-case.name: fn-innermost-056
test-case.description: Evaluates the "innermost" function with the input sequence containing duplicates
test-case.test: let $in := for $x in //* order by local-name($x) return $x return deep-equal(fn:innermost(($in, $in))/local-name(), fn:innermost(//*)/local-name())

test-case.name: fn-innermost-057
test-case.description: Evaluates the "innermost" function with the input sequence empty

test-case.name: fn-innermost-058
test-case.description: Check that "innermost" doesn't change node identity
